#h0 to h10 - two different pods
#e1[1] -> ag1[3] -> c1[2] -> ag3[1] -> e3
#e1 00-00-00-10-00-00
#ag1 00-20-00-00-00-00
#c1 00-00-00-30-00-00
#ag3 00-20-00-00-00-02
#e3 00-00-00-10-00-02
#h0 10.0.0.1
#h10 10.0.0.11
setflow 00-00-00-10-00-00 10.0.0.11 1
setflow 00-00-00-10-00-02 10.0.0.1 1
setflow 00-20-00-00-00-00 10.0.0.11 3
setflow 00-20-00-00-00-00 10.0.0.1 1
setflow 00-00-00-30-00-00 10.0.0.1 1
setflow 00-00-00-30-00-00 10.0.0.11 2
setflow 00-20-00-00-00-02 10.0.0.11 1
setflow 00-20-00-00-00-02 10.0.0.1 3
